That's the tip of the iceberg. I was snorting that, I fell off the stage... That shows you what kind of a drug addict I was. "Only the finest for me... Dean Takahasi van Venturebeat stelt het nog scherper: Op een gegeven moment kan Steve Ballmer niet meer de schuld op mensen binnen de organisatie schuiven en moet hij zelf de verantwoordelijkheid nemen. Dat hebben we eerder gezien bij Nokia en AMD. De kans lijkt klein dat met het aanstellen van nieuwe topmanagers de aandeelhouders direct tevreden gesteld worden. BGC Partners analyst Colin Gillis said that Google experienced tremendous growth under Eric Schmidt , becoming a search and advertising powerhouse, although the company also arguably experienced a number of missteps and missed opportunities. A case can also be made that the company has not built any new material revenue streams, was late to building for the mobile market, has no effective social solutions, overbuilt its headcount and placed itself in the crosshairs of government regulators, Gillis said. Editor-in-chief of technology blog SearchEngineLand.com Danny Sullivan said Google's biggest challenges now are to "prove that they've got their Mojo back and that nobody needs to fear them."
